properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT QNA_NO , BOARD_TITLE , CREATE_DATE , REPLY , OPEN , BOARD_WRITER FROM QNA WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM QNA WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

)

UPDATE QNA SET QNA_VIEWS = QNA_VIEWS + 1 WHERE QNA_NO = ?
